channel.title: Comments on: Eric Dyck Talks App Monetization Using Tap for Tap’s Plugin for Corona SDK

item.title: By: Dave
item.dc:creator: Dave
item.description: I recently started using tap for tap in most of my apps. I stopped using it for generating revenue all together. The revenue it generated was far lower then the rest of my ad providers. With that being said I'm using it 100% for what it was intended for which is a tap exchange. Tap for tap has driven almost 500 new users to my apps through the tap exchange. Sometimes gaining users is worth more then the immediate revenue anyways.
item.content:encoded: I recently started using tap for tap in most of my apps. I stopped using it for generating revenue all together. The revenue it generated was far lower then the rest of my ad providers. With that being said I’m using it 100% for what it was intended for which is a tap exchange. Tap for tap has driven almost 500 new users to my apps through the tap exchange. Sometimes gaining users is worth more then the immediate revenue anyways.
